name: 3Blox
description:
3Blox is an addictive puzzle game. It's easy to learn, fun and hard to master. The rule is similar to the traditional Tetris game, but it has very simple and distinctive gameplay:

* Tap the shape to rotate
* Drag and drop to clear rows of blocks
* No time pressure
* 25+ basic shapes and 40+ advance shapes
* You have 3 shapes to choose logically in one turn
* The shapes fly up by some kind of magic force instead of falling down

DOWNLOAD for FREE now and compete with your friends in the Game Center!
